publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2868 Christine Grahame on behalf of the Justice 1 Committee: Justice 1 Committee's 8th Report 2001: Report on Legal Aid Inquiryâ€”That the Parliament notes the 8th Report, 2001 of the Justice 1 Committee, Report on Legal Aid Inquiry (SP Paper 437) and further notes that the Committee intends to publish a final report on legal aid in due course.
